page.title: 12Education
page.content: Eastcote Primary School was built in 1935,and serves its immediate neighbourhood and almost all its 180 pupils live within walking distance.The pupils aged 5_11 years are grouped into 7 classes by age.The purpose of primary education is to learn the basic skills of reading,writing and number in that order to understand our world and prepare for secondary school and adult life. We consider that learning to get on with people,art,craft,and physical activities will be useful later on. We are helped by a paid team of adults_ teachers,secretary,caretaker,cleaners, kitchen staff.Some parents help out.Social workers and school inspectors visit regularly.
